name: Naklua VR
description: Naklua VR is a large puzzle game set in a spacious sky where you must navigate a multitude of levels, traps and dangerous paths. Naklua has used VR to it's advantage by making the experience as limitless as possible.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 (64) Processor: intel i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 (64) Processor: intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
